item.title: Setting up a new Mac for Development
item.description: This is the Homebrew Cask setup of my personal development laptop. Feel free to use this as a starting point for a fresh install of any new OSX machine.

item.title: Update Sourcetree Password on OSX
item.description: If you've reset your password in Bitbucket or another Git client, you'll get an error or a prompt for your password every single time you try to connect to a project.
item.dc:creator: bryan-dugan

item.title: Upgrade PHP with Homebrew
item.description: Need to update PHP for use with your local development stack? This short guide will run you through how to do just that, as well as upgrading your PHP version in Laravel Valet.
item.dc:creator: bryan-dugan

item.title: Website launch checklist
item.description: The checklist that I personally use each time I launch a new website. Feel free to modify this list to your liking.

item.title: Runcloud configuration for Craft CMS
item.description: If you're setting up a Craft CMS website on a RunCloud server for your first time, here is everything you need to get setup.

item.title: Creating Symlinks in OSX
item.description: It is possible in OSX to create a Symlink (symbolic link) or shortcut in Terminal to get to that specific folder extremely quickly.

item.title: Books I Love on Design, Development and Bettering yourself
